adrFormatAddress: 1791 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: Strides Pharmacy is absolutely wonderful! The pharmacist, Thomas is excellent. He goes out of his way to help you by finding coupons to apply to help deduct your out of pocket cost. He’s very knowledgeable and so kind! I would recommend Strides Pharmacy to everyone!

text.text: Strides Pharmacy is absolutely wonderful! The pharmacist, Thomas is excellent. He goes out of his way to help you by finding coupons to apply to help deduct your out of pocket cost. He’s very knowledgeable and so kind! I would recommend Strides Pharmacy to everyone!

originalText.text: I love this pharmacy. The pharmacist, Thomas, is so kind and knowledgeable and goes out of his way to help customers. I would recommend Strides and I do to all of my friends and family. It’s a much better experience than going to your generic big box, pharmacies, which tend to be very impersonal at best, and a nightmare, most of the time. If you have any questions or concerns about your pharmaceutical needs, Strides is definitely the place to go.

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of experiencing world-class customer service from Jorge. His dedication to exceeding expectations was evident throughout my interaction. From prompt responses to going the extra mile to solve issues, Jorge showcased exceptional professionalism and courtesy. He truly understands the meaning of outstanding service, making my customer experience memorable. Kudos to Jorge for setting a benchmark in customer care!!!

text.text: I had the pleasure of experiencing world-class customer service from Jorge. His dedication to exceeding expectations was evident throughout my interaction. From prompt responses to going the extra mile to solve issues, Jorge showcased exceptional professionalism and courtesy. He truly understands the meaning of outstanding service, making my customer experience memorable. Kudos to Jorge for setting a benchmark in customer care!!!

originalText.text: Where do I even begin. Maybe with Thomas, Fernando and Jorge (or if it’s George my bad!) when I tell you the staff at this place goes absolutely above and beyond wouldnt really do this place justice. I was newly daignosed with Type 1 after being misdiagnosed for over a year and when I had to get medication a pharmacist will tell you the regimen these guys give you the play by play from experience.. not only that I can’t tell you guys how knowledgeable and patient with a guest that’s learning. A prime example of this is when I requested for my insulin pump Thomas literally started watching videos independently to better help me understand how to navigate this new normal for me. I can’t tell you how much that means from someone who thought I was lost in this new ting having a place I can to an ask questions is a life saver. I don’t do the reviews thing and I just realized I wrote one long paragraph. Sorry! Anyways go to this place it’s a GEM

originalText.text: I just got my Covid vaccine today and they had great customer service as well as explaining details about the vaccine that I was going to get. I would definitely recommend this pharmacy in the area. They were fast and they catered to me. I was in and out within 5 minutes.
